challenge.title: Discrete Mathematics Using a Computer - Cordelia Hall - Chapter 4
challenge.description: Cordelia Hall's Discrete Mathematics Using a Computer is an introduction to computational discrete mathematics using Haskell.
challenge.instructions: Use Archive.org E-Reserves to read Cordelia Hall's Discrete Mathematics Using a Computer, Chapter Four.
